steps.title: Attend a yoga camp at Baba Ramdev’s yoga institute if you are in India.
steps.content: Attend a yoga camp at Baba Ramdev’s yoga institute if you are in India. If you live in or are visiting India, you can meet Baba Ramdev by taking a yoga camp at Patanjali Yogpeeth, his yoga institute. [1] X Research source To sign up for a yoga camp, visit the institute’s website at https://divyayoga.com/ .

steps.title: Send a message through the Patanjali website for a simpler approach.
steps.content: Send a message through the Patanjali website for a simpler approach. There is a contact form on the yoga institute’s website that will allow you to send a message to Baba Ramdev. [2] X Research source To find the contact form, go to https://divyayoga.com/contact-us/ . Enter your name, email address, and the subject of your message. Then, draft a short message and submit it by clicking send.

steps.title: Call Baba Ramdev if you want to speak to him in person.
steps.content: Call Baba Ramdev if you want to speak to him in person. It’s likely that Baba Ramdev gets lots of calls from fans, so he may not answer or respond to a message. However, it’s worth a shot! Simply call Baba Ramdev’s office at 91-1334-240008. Ask to speak to him, or leave a message if he’s unavailable. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Reach out to Baba Ramdev on social media if you have an account.
steps.content: Reach out to Baba Ramdev on social media if you have an account. Baba Ramdev has several social media profiles that can help you connect with him. You can follow Baba Ramdev, comment on his posts, or send him messages through the platform of social media. Simply go to the following sites: [4] X Research source www.divyayoga.com https://www.facebook.com/swami.ramdev/ https://www.instagram.com/swaamiramdev/ https://twitter.com/yogrishiramdev https://www.pinterest.com/Swaamiramdev/

steps.title: Email Baba Ramdev if you prefer private communication.
steps.content: Email Baba Ramdev if you prefer private communication. If you post on social media, other users may be able to see your messages. If you want to share personal information with Baba Ramdev, you can email him instead. Send the message to: divyayoga@divyayoga.com. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Write Baba Ramdev a letter for a more traditional method.
steps.content: Write Baba Ramdev a letter for a more traditional method. If you’re not a fan of email, you can always send Baba Ramdev a letter. Be sure to use neat handwriting and include a self-addressed stamped envelope so it’s easy for Baba Ramdev to reply. Send your letter to: [6] X Research source Baba Ramdev c/o Patanjali Yogpeeth, Maharshi Dayanand Gram Delhi-Haridwar National Highway Near Bahadarbad Haridwar-249405 Uttarakhand, India

steps.title: Introduce yourself.
steps.content: Introduce yourself. Regardless of how you decide to contact Baba Ramdev, you should first introduce yourself. Tell your name and general location, as well as any other pertinent information. For instance, you could say, “Hello, my name is Meredith Jones and I’m a yoga teacher in Los Angeles, California.”

steps.title: Explain why you want to meet.
steps.content: Explain why you want to meet. Baba Ramdev likely gets thousands of emails and messages from fans all over the world. Don’t waste too much time gushing over how much you adore him—just get to the point. For example, tell him, “I’ve got a class of advanced students who are fascinated by your teachings. We would like to invite you to attend a yoga retreat in California this summer.”

steps.title: Present possible meeting dates and locations.
steps.content: Present possible meeting dates and locations. Keep in mind that Baba Ramdev lives in India, and isn’t likely to travel across the world to meet fans. However, he may be willing to meet if you can coordinate the visit with another event he has scheduled. Visit his website to find out if he will be in your area any time in the near future. Give several meeting dates, times, and locations for Baba Ramdev to choose from. For instance, you could say, “The yoga retreat will be held from June 17-27, 2018 at Sagrada Wellness in Margarita, California. Your website indicates that you will be in the U.S. for another event around this time, and we’d love to have you stop by the retreat any time you are available.”

steps.title: Provide your contact information.
steps.content: Provide your contact information. Even if Baba Ramdev isn’t able to meet with you, he likely appreciates your interest and effort. Thank him for this time before signing off. Be sure to include your full name and contact information so he can reply if he is able. For example, say, “Thank you for your time, and I hope to hear back from you soon. You can reach me at 310-555-7864 or theyogimeredithjones@hotmail.com. Best wishes, Meredith Jones.”
